common.title: NFT Marketplace UI
common.crownsDescription: Crowns are a collection of 10,000 procedurally generated traditional & psychedelic 3D crowns on the Internet Computer, backed by asset provenance from CAP.
common.notConnectedMessage: You’re not connected to Plug yet. Click the button below to connect.

description.makeListing: Enter the sale price you want for your NFT.
description.pendingConfirmation: Please confirm the transaction within Plug Wallet.
description.listingComplete: Congrats, your NFT is now listed for sale.
description.changePriceComplete: Congrats, your NFT listing has been updated.
description.changePrice: Enter the new sale price you want for your NFT.
description.nftPurchased: Congrats, you successfully purchased an NFT.
description.makeAnOffer: Enter the offer you want to make.
description.offerSubmitted: Congrats, you successfully placed an offer.
description.cancelListing: Are you sure you want to cancel the listing?
description.cancelOffer: Are you sure you want to cancel this Offer?
description.acceptOffer: Review the following offer and accept the bid.
description.offerAccepted: Congrats, you successfully accepted an offer.
description.withdrawAssets: The following fungible balances remain in the canister due to an error completing a transaction. Review the assets and click retry to receive them.
description.notEnoughFundsToPurchase: Transfer funds to your wallet to continue with the purchase of this NFT. If you have another asset you would like to swap for WICP you can use Sonic.
description.notEnoughFundsToMakeOffer: Your wallet does not have the minimum required funds to make this offer. Please acquire the funds and try again.
description.approveXtc: We’re almost ready to spawn your collection! To do so you will need to approve an XTC transaction.
description.approvedXtc: are ready to spawn your collection in the marketplace! You can do it now or come back another time to do so.
description.indexableTrait: These traits can be alphabetical or numerical, and can be filtered in your collection's sidebar. But you can always choose to hide specific traits.
description.nonIndexableTraits: These traits contain essential information about your items and are not filterable. Its function is to store specific information.

emptyStates.noNfts: You don’t own any NFT’s yet
emptyStates.noOwnedFilteredNfts: You don't own any NFTs with those filters
emptyStates.noFilteredNfts: No NFTs with the filters set
emptyStates.noNFTId: No NFT found with that ID

errorMessages.priceEmptyField: You need to fill in both values
errorMessages.unableToConnectToPlug: Oops! Unable to connect to plug
errorMessages.priceMinShouldBeLessThanMax: Max value must be greater than min value
errorMessages.unableToGetBalance: Oops! Unable to get wallet balance

alerts.transactionsMessage: You have unfinished or failed transactions,

tooltip.disabledBuyNowText: Oops! Can't be purchased, possibly because token was transferred outside Jelly marketplace to a new wallet

onboarding.logoInstruction: This is for your collection logo, 350 x 350 reccomended.
onboarding.featuredImageInstruction: This will be used for featuring your collection. 600 x 400 recommended.
onboarding.bannerImageInstruction: This will appear at the top of collection page. 1400 x 400 recommended.
onboarding.name: Name
onboarding.nameInstruction: This is the name of your collection, series, etc...
onboarding.descriptionInstruction: This is the description of your collection, series, etc...
onboarding.urlDescription: Customize the URL you get for Jelly.
onboarding.linkDescription: Add your links for better recognition of your collection.
onboarding.royaltiesDescription: Collect a fee when a user re-sells your NFT on Jelly.
onboarding.nftDetailsSubText: Lastly, check the NFTS details of your collection
onboarding.custodianError: You must be the canister ID custodian to proceed.
onboarding.nftSamplesDescription: File types supported: JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, MP4, WEBM, MP3, WAV, OGG, GLB, GLTF. Max size: 100 MB
onboarding.nftNameDescription: Set the names of your NFTs
onboarding.externalLinkDescription: Jelly will include a link to this URL on this item's detail page, so that users can click to learn more about it. You are welcome to link to your own webpage with more details.
onboarding.nftItemsDescription: This is the Description of your NFT items
onboarding.nftCollectionDetails: This is the collection where your items will appear.
onboarding.unblockableContentDescription: Unlockable content that can only be revealed by the owner of the item. You can acess and edit them individually on the NFT page.
onboarding.supplyDescription: The number of items that can be minted. No gas cost to you!
onboarding.emptyFieldError: You have to fill this field to continue. Please, try again.

traits.traitsDescription: Traits can be indexable and non-indexable. The Indexable Traits are filterable and are accessible to anyone while the non-indexable hold essencial information and are only availeble to you.
traits.indexableTraitsDescription: These traits can be alphabetical or numerical, and can be filtered in your collection's sidebar. But you can always choose to hide specific traits.
traits.nonIndexableTraitsDescription: These traits contain essential information about your items and are not filterable. Its function is to store specific information.

exploreCollections.description: Discover the collections that are taking shape before our eyes and see what’s new
